website_summaries.verdict: A practical kids picnic table that folds up easily for when you do not need it.
pros: Legs made from powder coated steel
Easy to set up wherever you need it
cons: This table is more functional than beautiful
It looks like a kid-sized version of an adult table

website_summaries.verdict: One of the few tables that actually offers built-in seating for children to use.
pros: Built-in bench seating is strong and durable for multiple children
Everything folds flat with just a few steps
cons: Takes up more room than other options

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-Duty and Folds VERY Flat!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-Duty and Folds VERY Flat!! This picnic table is Wonderful!! Features: - Picnic Table is VERY durable and Heavy-Duty!! - Can be used indoors or outside - Plastic is very easy to clean or completely rinse off - Entire unit is easy to fold and folds VERY flat! Easy to store anywhere (under a bed, against a wall, etc) - Kids and Adults can sit at table! I recommend this picnic table with seating! It is VERY durable, easy to clean, and easy to fold & store! It’s PERFECT and will last many years!! Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This review is 1.5 years after the purchase. The item arrived on time. I bought it for my son who was 3 at the time. Today him and his sisters (4, 7 & 10 years) use and fit at the table. The installation was very easy for one person. This table is no joke! We have moved 3 times since purchased. It's been used inside, outside and kept in storage. The table really holds up in the elements, kids and everyday wear and tear. I wouldn't hesitate to buy hear again. P.S. sorry Lifetime Products that my review took so long.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: I just love this table for my four kids which are 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love this table for my four kids which are 8 months, 2 1/2, 5, & 7! They eat and do homework at the table.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: SO GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you have kids! it's so versatile, we take it everywhere, camping, family holidays, or just a picnic in the backyard. Very sturdy table!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas G

customer_reviews.title: This is the table you want!
customer_reviews.text: Best item I've bought off amazon by far! I was worried it would be flimsy or too small but I run a daycare and the kids piled on it. I got 6 kids on it comfy, 2-4 years olds. Easy setup and down, easy to store, easy to clean. I will be purchasing another just to get more elbow room so then 4 can sit to a table but this is a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Best kids table ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table!!! My tiny 30" 2 year old can sit at it to eat and color easily, I can easily get my 5'3" self comfortably seated and participating with legs under the table, my 6' father can sit side sattle, 2 adults can sit together on one side with my 18 lb toddler on the other side and it doesn't even wobble! So sturdy and chic looking! No assembly, folds down flat, pops up easily, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Chanthrea

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because the little ones were getting crumbs all over the furniture and spilled a smoothie on the carpet. This lets them eat snacks without getting the furniture and carpets dirty, while waiting for the new kitchen table. Be cautious if the kids cant touch the ground with their feet yet. They can fall if they lean back too far. They should definitely be supervised while sitting. Also this table does not have good traction on tile. It slides around easily on ceramic tile. You can put a mat or carpet under it to help that. Due to the sliding, I give it 4 stars. Overall good product. Affordable price, portable, and saves my carpet and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: AineadeleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: What to say about this table? It is worth every penny. Durable, compact, quality, and light weight for such a solid kids table! Easy to go up and down. It even has locks! I am 5'2 with a disability and can manage it on my own. Fits my toddler perfect with room to grow. Can EASILY fit 4 kids. It's a must have if you entertain a bunch. I will upload pictures.
customer_reviews.author: agorak

customer_reviews.title: Individual parts seem durable but construction is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it was wobbly- to the point where it was going to caugh drink and paint spills and wasn’t going to serve my purposes for a snack/craft table for my kids. Reviewers said theirs weren’t wobbly so I had mine replaced and lo and behold the replacement is exactly the same quality. I wanted to love it because the table surface seemed awesome and sturdy and the seats were nice but with all the wiggling and wobbling it wasn’t going to work for us.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyEverythingonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Table great. Packaging not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I would probably give this a five star if the packaging was better and the instructions. The product itself is pretty easy to open up/set up. The box it came in was destroyed by the carrying straps and the styrofoam they used is the type that gets on everything. There are so many types of packages options available now this could easily be changed. Otherwise I think the table is perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this table. I have many other Lifetime products that I love, which is why I ended up purchasing this one. Pros: It’s adorable, very easy to fold and re-assemble, and it is very compact for storage. Con: it wobbles like crazy when in use. My kids are ages 3 and 4 and I’m honestly afraid it’s going to collapse. My son even said he was afraid to sit on it (he’s 40 pounds). I reached out to Lifetime customer service and was told it’s normal for it to wobble, so I guess it is what it is. Wouldn’t purchase again based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2, 4, and 6yo. they were all huddling around this lego table I purchased that has a cover to eat at. Plates were falling off, they couldnt do crafts. Nothing. So I bought this. AND for 2 days now they have barely left the table. Slime easily wipes off. Crayon, food, drinks, etc. it folds up real nice and I can tuck it behind the chair when they go to sleep. I also bought this to take camping with us. I absolutely love this table and wish I had bought this sooner
customer_reviews.author: Amanda cohen

customer_reviews.title: nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: we use this little table for our 3 year old granddaughter all the time. she eats on it - colors on it (literally) and it's very sturdy and easy to clean. will be moving it outdoors next spring for a little picnic table for her - and expect to be able to hose it down and bring it back in the house next winter again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa JH

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: My kids grew up with a wood picnic table in the house. They ate, colored and played at it. So when I started babysitting my grandson, I wanted one for him too. I bought this table because I could close it up when not in use. The table looks great and cleans up easy. However, I was a little disappointed that the table sways from side to side when my grandson sits down at it or gets up from it. It isn't going to fall or anything like that. It just seems a like it could be sturdier. With that said, I would buy it again. In fact I may buy one for him to have at his house.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at SO MANY different picnic tables for kids & I'm so glad I settled here! Most of the other ones either weren't sturdy enough for crazy kiddos or they were too small! This one is perfect size for a variety of ages. My 4 year old (who is big for his age) is perfect size for it with room to grow & he could've had this when he started walking. Folds up easily for storage & is super easy to put up again. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMama

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up and Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: This was set up in 5 seconds out of the bix- no parts to out together! Yay! And super durable like a lot of Lifetime tables I use at church. Our toddlers (4 & 2) fit pefectly. I bet a xhild up to age 6 or 7 would be just fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all this table is sturdy as all get out. All these reviews saying it isn’t must have monsters they can’t control bouncing and growling from the table. I love it! Super easy to clean because the plastic which was a key point for me! I felt like wood table would not hold up to being cleaned often. This is easy there aren’t books and crannies and my 5 and 4 year old have plenary of room to grow into the table!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest picnic table for toddlers and young children. It is sturdy and a good size (we have it set up in our tiny living room and it is not really in the way). Adults sat on it and it held up well - no bending or groaning. Our granddaughter loves sitting at it and serving "lunch" to us. She is two and her feet don't touch the floor, but she climbs on with ease. I can see many years of use from this table as she grows into it. Also plan to use it outside in the summer. And it folds up flat to store. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cmmeri

customer_reviews.title: Best kids table!
customer_reviews.text: We love this table so much. Quick and easy to put up and take down! Perfect for out 20 month old and 6 year old. The bed think we've bought for the kids recently! It's great that it's small enough to fold up and fit behind the desk furniture when not in use. We were looking at other tables but we couldn't pass up this one because of the folding feature. shipping was quick and table was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: No assembly. It folds out in seconds. Plenty sturdy enough for several kids. We use it in the living room. When the grandkids visit us we pull it out of the closet and set it up so they have a place to play with Duplo or Kinex or just draw pictures. When they leave it is folded flat and out of sight in 5 minutes. Will be buying another one to leave outside.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 year old niece. Her feet dangle a little, but she had no trouble getting on or off by herself. She will use this for at least a few years. One piece, easy to set up and fold down. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie W

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a snap. I just had to unfold it like an ironing board. Wow, why can't all toys and furniture be that simple? It's sturdy enough for me to sit at with my son (I'm just 105 lbs, but it can hold much more it seems). This is perfect for teaching my toddler how to SIT while eating since the grown up tables are a little intimidating. I love this. For only about $50, it's a steal for such high quality. It's very sturdy. No wonder it's the best selling picnic table on Amazon. I just wish there were a wider variety of colors to chose from.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous ReviewerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Too wobbly and too small
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes when we ordered. Unfortunately we received one that was too wobbly, just like other reviewers, so back it went. On a side note, we didn't reorder because we realized it was too small for long term use by two growing kid (4 & 7), possibly getting only one year tops before having to move on to a bigger table. (My kids are both 98% on height-scale so this table may work if used my smaller kids.)
customer_reviews.author: zimplegirrl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids table
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my daughter last year for Christmas. It's perfect for her 5 and 2 year old. My other daughter loved it so much she wanted one too for her 1 and 3 year old. She doesn't have much room, so it's nice for her to fold it up. It's sturdy, east to fold and great for feeding the kids or for doing projects on. Perfect size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table! We live full time in a fifth wheel camper and this works perfectly for our living room. Mom and dad can eat on the couch, but our little guys are far too messy and they make a mess getting their food from the floor to their mouths when sitting on the floor. This table slides beautifully next to the counter when not in use and is really easy to set up and flatten down. When summer comes, we are getting a full size one for outside, too, and that's where we will eat all of our meals, weather permitting.
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean. Set up was quick.
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old took to eating at this table immediately. It's very cute and doesn't take up too much room. We were able to fit 6 toddlers at this table at our last party by adding two chairs at the ends. It's easy to wipe up after feeding time and it's sturdy enough for my pregnant wife and I to sit at the other end (although the fit is a little tight for us.) We can see her using this table for many more years. It's metal and plastic so we can take it outside if needed, which is a nice bonus for summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schiffer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly but perfect size
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I ordered a replacement. It’s half as wobbly. Different batches different amount of wobble. ——— Wow am I torn. This thing is ridiculously wobbly. I was going to return it. But at the moment it’s the only kids table I can find that fits our 3 and 5 year old after they outgrew the excellent round Little Tykes table. So keeping it because it’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: NY Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: easy kids table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for all the toddlers/preschoolers and older! It is easy to assemble, move, fold up, and clean! We use it for my 3 year old's breakfast, lunch, activities, and crafts so leave it up daily and it looks brand new (1.5 years old). My in-laws like it bc they can store it easily and get it out when the grandkids come over. At holiday dinner, there were kids ages 3, 4, 6, and 10 years old that sat comfortably. I'd definitely recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but great table
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be. Table was easy to set up and easy to fold back down to store. My kids love eating outside on the table and have a picnic as they call it. I like having a kid size table for outside so I don’t have to watch my kids as they eat at our outdoor dining table. They are 1 and 4 and fit nicely so I think we have at least a couple more years before they outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice table!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2 and 6 year old nicely. It folds very easy with 1 step. I have it set up permanently outside in the shade so will see how it holds up concerning rust but so far so good. It's sturdy, easy to clean and the kids love eating on it. It is also very nice looking, not kiddie so it fits with our patio. Price is very reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara-Bear-8

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except that it wobbles..
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a short while now. Like I mentioned in the title, it works but it wobbles. I've attached the video of how wobbly it gets for whoever is interested to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: PoHao Su

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up and take down. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Needed a table for visiting grandchildren to play and snack. Saw this one (but and ugly green color) in the window of a local store. Liked the look and feel and was thrilled to find it on Amazon in a decent color for less. Pops up real easy and we love the way it folds flat to store. It also eliminates the shoving matches that started recently where the kiddie card table we were using would get pushed back and forth. Also, the seats are attached so they won't be falling over as would happen with the chairs and the surface is easy to clean. May get a couple more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: PowayBob

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you have young ones, go camping or to the park, this is a must have. Fairly light weight (I can carry around) and folds completely flat. It seems to be very good quality. The kids plop down on it, all try to sit on one side, play, eat, etc and it has really held up. Doesn't stain and locks into place for safety. Only negative is that due to how it set up there is a slight wobble to it, but nothing that would compromise it's integrity. Just me being a little nit picky.
customer_reviews.author: Tara & Wes

customer_reviews.title: Folds flat, easy to clean awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This table is probably one of the best purchases we have gotten for our grand kids yet. It's not fancy, but they don't care. For the price it is sturdy, easy to clean, robust and it folds completely flat. We don't have a lot of room for just us much less all of the stuff we have at our house for the kids and usually when the family visits they are eating with us and having a table that is their size is great. They have a place to sit that isn't in our laps, it keeps the dogs away from their plates and it helps them learn to eat at a table. Great table!
customer_reviews.author: John_or_BethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Instant table and bench
customer_reviews.text: The table is such a great addition to those with kids. My 2 yo loves it and its a good amount of space for activities. It is easy to set up, not too heavy and cleans up decently well. It will support even adults but not comfortably. This is an instant table and seats (bench) which is what I love. Wish the plastic can be sealed somehow as marking it often stains it. However, that seems to be the case with this kind of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great little table for little ones, we have three nephews between 2-5 and it did the job of giving them their own kid table. Folds up nice to store under our bed. If it was just a bit bigger I’d have given 5 stars but it’s kinda on the small side so it’s usless for kids who are a bit older. If they had two height settings to it so you can make it taller as needed for toddlers and then young children it’d be a stellar buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny & Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday childrens' table
customer_reviews.text: Very light which is good for portability, but my 2 sons like to slide it around the floor. A little wobbly, but pretty sturdy. My oldest is 4' tall and 62 pounds and my middle is almost 4' tall and 49 pounds, and they can sit there comfortably with 2 friends. Very easy to clean, much better than the slatted wooden picnic table we had before, and no sharp corners to run into. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LauritaLaLora

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE TABLES!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables! I use these outside and fold them up and put in the garage as needed. So easy to fold up and set up. Perfect for 4 kids (2 on each side) ages 1 -5/6 years old! Very happy with these tables! I know of other people who use them indoors and perfect for that too! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: my other daughter-in-law liked it so much she asked if we could get ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to one grandchild for 1st b'day (other children in family can use it too) and after seeing it, my other daughter-in-law liked it so much she asked if we could get that for their child on their 1st b'day also. We did! Easy shopping! Quality is very good. Easy to open & close for storage. We've been very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tables!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one of my children’s birthday parties, knowing there would be many more in the next several years with three young children. Lots of the moms commented on them, saying how much they liked them. I know I’ll get a lot of use out of these in the next 5 years, and then I’ll sell them.
customer_reviews.author: KathrynTX

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime company, much to be desired, customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Lifetime products for decades; but this product was a huge disappointment. It was not assembled as described, I picked up the table and it fell apart. I contacted Amazon and they handled the and solved the issue within minutes, literally. They completely satisfied me. I contacted Lifetime to advise them of the problem, out of respect, and I was treated horribly. I was contacted by them in an email and given the wrong information by their customer service department. I have to say that Amazon's customer service was awesome. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.-B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoors, outdoors or taking to grandmas
customer_reviews.text: We loooooove this table! It fits 4 kids very very comfortably and we add a chair to each end when we need more seats. It folds flat and is light enough to move inside, outside etc. we take it to all family gatherings. The top is 1 piece and textured - good for most activities but not completely smooth if you need that. Great for eating, coloring, gingerbread house making, play doh etc! And made in the USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Suz

customer_reviews.title: A game-changer! You won't be sorry buying this (esp. if you are low on space)
customer_reviews.text: Jeff's wife here, reporting on one of the best buys of the summer! This is our second purchase of a Lifetime brand product, and as much as we enjoy our giant bi-fold folding table, I'm not surprised that this is a home run as well. Our fiercely independent daughter loves that she can seat herself at this study table, and I love that it's easy to clean and store. Win-Win! It's been great for when friends are over as well, kids love sitting at it (and grown-ups love not having to sacrifice a full-sized chair).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean, great size!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy, out of the box 'pop-up' to sturdy table. Same easy 'fold' for storage. Can hold more weight than many comparable tables-benches, and a great size for toddler-preschool to small elementary children. Many of the cute tables are more 'toddler' size but those benches can easily tip with an enthusiastic but uncoordinated small child. Buy this and you will have one sturdy table for several years. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Net2018

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2-year old grandchildren. I was really impressed with the quality. Only thing I struggle with (and it isn’t much of a struggle) is depressing the buttons to put down the top. If there are 2 people putting it away, it is super easy. It stores easily, taking up minimal space. I am so glad I purchased this item and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for my grandchildren. But the best part of all you don't have to assemble the table!! It comes out of the box, fold down the legs and there you go, ready to use. I bought this for my 4 year old and 17 month old granddaghters and it's perfect. It will continue to grow with them as even I can sit at this table. Great buy, great value, best part: NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Rancourt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & folds down easily for storage!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table after seeing it at a friend's house. It is great for extra seating when we have other families with multiple children over. It is easy to set up and take down. It folds down completely flat for storage, so we are able to slide it in a small space until next use. We even packed it in the trunk of our minivan when we went camping. It worked great for meals, art projects and puzzles. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: True to the advertisement!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this table. Its the renaissance table for sure. From cookout, to breakfast, to lunch, to art, to homework. Just awesome!! Great purchase. It has rained several times since we had it and there's not one sign of rusting. Like monsoon type rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table for Kids - Skip the others!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a Fisher Price table for my toddler son, but am so glad I returned it for this table. The Lifetime Kid's Picnic table is so much sturdier and larger. It fit my toddler, a 16 yr old, and a 13 yr old (the teens were scrunched, but comfy). It could fit three toddlers on each side snugly, or four total with room to spare. Folding the table is a breeze. I highly recommend this for those in a market for a kid's table.
customer_reviews.author: Nemi

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Great table but it is wobbly. The pole that inserts into the other pole at the locking mechanism is too small, does not fit flush/sturdy and therefore wobbles back and forth. Bummer, returning.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table. Easy to clean. good product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. Very easy to clean surfaces. Enough space for four small children. Probably to small for 9-10 year olds. I weigh approximately 190 and it holds me no problem. Doesn’t crick or feel weak under me and doesn’t act like it will flip over with my weight on just one side. We are pleased. Very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Lakieta

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fairly compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for camping trips and backyard use. It is pretty compact and can easily fit inside the storage bay of a RV or in the trunk of a SUV. Perfect height for toddlers or smaller children, and strong enough for an adult to also sit at. The table can easily be wiped or hosed down for cleanup. Hopefully, just like the name of the brand, this will last for a "Lifetime".
customer_reviews.author: Shadee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9, 7, and 5 year olds and we have been through some tables. This one is by far the best. No cover to rip or chairs to lose or fight over. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs.

customer_reviews.title: Freed up dining table space and serves as a desk and bench seat
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this little table. Ages 2.5 and 4.5, they play at it, eat at it and many times just sit there. Comfortably sits 4, could seat 6 small ones. It does fold up nicely to take up no more space (in thickness) than the thickness of the table top itself. Easy to store between refrigerator and wall, for us. Is fairly strong and while it may hold much older and larger kids, I would not trust it in some cases. Impact would be more an issue but still, its design is perfect for most 2 to 5yo, in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: NoLongerOnAmazonTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I own this table in this size and also the adult size. I LOVE the adult one, however the kid one is not that wonderful. No more than 4 kids fit at it, preferably kids that are 2 years old and under. Also it is slightly wobbly. I bought it for outdoor snack and meal time for my daycare. I will buy another one because I do like that they fold flat but that is the only reason why.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Foldable Kids table
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect kids table for all events! My daughter is two we also use it when we babysit ages 18 months - my 9 year old nephew. It’s sturdy enough for me to sit with my daughter at I’m 5’3” 135 lbs. we use it for crafts and eating and the river and thanksgiving etc ..
customer_reviews.author: CLoomis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use. Don’t have to worry about kids playing and throwing their chairs around bc it’s all one piece. Update: it’s been a year and the table is very wobbly and very noisy. It hasn’t lasted like I thought it would. Nothing I do can fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this table today and first thing I noticed was how small it folds! It was easy to set up and take down and seems really sturdy. My 19 month old granddaughter climbed right on the seat and it's perfect with room to grow. We have a baby shower here this weekend with several little ones coming so I'll update after that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Great picnic table for this summer and many to come as long as you take care of it! I’ve only had it for a month and already traveled with it, very useful if your child has cousins and other littles. My daughter is 2 and it’s perfect size for her. Her cousins fit perfect in it as well and they are 4. It took a few extra days and it also said it may have been lost? Eventually it showed up and got delivered to my neighbors address.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Roomy Enough for 4
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday, but I was very impressed with it! It's great quality, very sturdy, easy to pop-up and put away. My kids had breakfast on it this morning. I was looking for a "kids' table" for family gatherings, but none of the results I found for wooden tables looked big enough. They had 4 chairs, but the surface area didn't look like it would have room for everyone's plates (or coloring books!). This is plenty of room for 4 kids! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sands

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery/great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I don't know about anyone else but I'm satisfied with my choice on this item. The kids love it so far. It's big enough for my 3 little one ages 3, 5, and 7 who as of right now are playing with their kitchen items having a picnic. Lol. I personally chose this because it's foldable with the seats attached. The kids broke the last table they had which was wood and this I know won't be as easy to break. I just received the item today so I can't say how long it will last but hopefully it'll last awhile. Regardless it's affordable and if needed I'll purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love this picnic table!!
customer_reviews.text: This little picnic table is awesome!! My 18 month old twins and 6 year old all love their new table. They want to eat on it all the time and love coloring or doing crafts on it. Built very well. I can tell it will last us a long time. We can also take it anywhere. Folds up easily. So happy we ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TABLE!! I got this to upgrade from our Little Tikes picnic table. It is perfect. Not only is it FAR sturdier, but it is larger to use with a wider age range. Also, I love that it can EASILY fold flat and be stored or taken places. I also like that the kids can slide into the seats instead of having to climb into them like most picnic table styles.
customer_reviews.author: DaniCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: This table is great!
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! Easy to fold and store in closet when not in use. I bought this table for grandkids ( 2 & 4 yrs and soon to be 1yr ) since they like to use my padded table chairs as napkins...figured this would do the trick and be great during holidays as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for outside or inside fun.
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect thing to use for our toddler grandchildren. Although it has a slight wobble to it, it is generally sturdy and comfortable seating. The kids love sitting at the table to eat or play. I love the fact that it is easily moved from deck to yard or back inside. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Honey, I shrunk the picnic table.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like a big, rubbermaid plastic and metal folding picnic table, but smaller. My kid can dance on it and he is husky. I was actually surprised at how nice this thing is, exceeded my expectations and it truly is easy to fold and store. This is for my 3-1/2 year old autistic son (who is too big for a high chair now) and his little brother, who is about 18 months. They dig it, alot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is durable and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect! It sits my 3 (tall) boys ages 8, 4, and 2. I love that it folds completely flat and snaps shut so it is safe to store. I have had kids' folding tables and chairs and I hate how easily they get destroyed by normal wear and tear. Plus, having to not store chairs in addition to a table is great. We use it indoors as kids' table for holidays and a craft table.
customer_reviews.author: J. Van Ryswyk

customer_reviews.title: Very Wobbily!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this table for my 6 year old granddaughter. Opened the box and set it up and kinda disappointed. I might send back not sure yet but it's very wobbily, not solid. It did set up fairly easy but haven't folded up yet.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: Classic look but no splinters!!!
customer_reviews.text: May not be a cute as the “classic” wooden table, but built to last and super convenient to be able to fold down! Have had ours for a few months, up everyday in the sun... and still perfect! Also love the fact we can store it flat for the winter!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: table for small kids
customer_reviews.text: omg! this table is perfect for my 3 grand children age 2 6 and 7 they love eating on it where they can all sit together i had a minnie table with 2 chairs it was ok til another grandchild got old enough to sit at a a table i've had so many people at our bq;s ask where i got it. its made so durable it washes easy you can't hurt it its made just like the big tables and the price was so reasonable
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it's sturdier than other tables for kids. I also like that it's foldable for portability. Kids use it for dinner time and art time. Easy to clean unless its permanent. But I can't to use it camping. Kids love having their own area.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor or outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my very tall 5 year old. I am 5'4 and can easily slide into the other side. It is lightweight and easily cleaned. I would definitely recommend this as there are no separate sets to worry about and my kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: TFBenitez

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!! A little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I lovvvvvve this table. It folds so flatly, easy to clean, and it’s perfectly sized. My daughter who is 2 loves to eat at it, color, play, etc. the only complaint I have is that it is VERY wobbly. She is skiddish, and it took her a little while to get brave enough to sit on it because of the wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor Kids Table
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is all contained, our 5 and 7 year old can use it just fine. Probably be find for them until the oldest turns 9 or 10 and then might be a bit small. I wouldn't say 4 people could sit comfortably at my kids ages.
customer_reviews.author: DaBarge

customer_reviews.title: Good but one issue
customer_reviews.text: It's losing one star from me because we bought it to be out on the porch and from description/photos looks like it should be fine for outdoor but it's already got rust and I haven't even had it a month yet. So just be weary of leaving it setup outside, may want to take it down and store indoors when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Azlyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kids table
customer_reviews.text: I have several lifetime products (including kayaks) and as expected, this table is of great quality. I know my boys love having picnics at their table and it is super sturdy. I love that it folds so easily too and is easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Britney McVicker

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and tear down!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this table... and our friends who have seen us set it up do too! It's so easy to set up and to fold back up and throw into the car. It's bigger than the standard colorful plastic picnic tables so our 4 year old fits so much better. Our 2 year old can also sit at it, but her feet dangle a bit. It folds incredibly flat as well! We take it when we know we'll be sharing a meal with kiddos and set it up inside or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: JCaudill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Came completely assembled. Great quality. Durable. Easily fits my 3 kids (twin 7 year olds and 2 year old) and can fit a fourth kid with similar build with no issue. I love that it folds away so nicely. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for four toddlers up to age 5 or 6. Strong enough for 150 lb person to sit but weight difference from one side to then other may cause see-saw effect. We keep out by pool but will also use inside. Easy to clean and fold. No assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Czerwin

customer_reviews.title: Best picnic bench for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great little table for the little kids. We’ve taken this table to Palm Springs for a family vacation, camping, and dinners with the family. It’s too small for adults to sit on but perfect for my son who is 5 and daughter who is 2. It folds up flat and can be packed up in the van easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it looks like, a kids picnic table. I have no complaints about the quality. It was a little smaller than I imagined it would be, but will grow with my children for the next several years. Will be used for eating, arts and crafts, schooling, and play! It serves its purpose well and I got it at an amazing deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to glue Lego Duplo bases to for a toddler table at my business. As other people commented, it is a little wobbly, but appears it will hold up great. The kids love it. Definately not fir bigger kids. Would recommend for ages 5 and under.
customer_reviews.author: MBallard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great investment if you entertain and there’s littles!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. I had been borrowing a friends for a few years for family gatherings. Now that we have a grandson, I wanted our own. We will continue to use for family dinners so the littles have a safe place to eat without worrying about them falling from high chairs at the dining room table. I also see lots of use for coloring, painting and games as they grow. It folds up easily and fits nicely beneath our full size guest bed. I accidentally ordered two and have one to my daughter instead of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my 2 year old and his friends. My son loves this table, and uses it everyday. They can sit at the table and draw/play, and when it's snack time, there's more than enough room for them to all have their snacks at the table. The material seems durable and I like that the construction is similar to a large table I purchased at a big box store. My friend's 6-9 year kids have also sat at the table and it seemed fine enough for them (they range in height from 3'6" to 5'0") so I have not doubt this table with last us for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: KnG

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my 5 year olds playroom. Is a little shaky but holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how much we use this and how well it works....it folds completely flat and tucks away so easily. The stand up and break down is super simple. Really sturdy and well made. Well thought out....even the clips to holds the legs work perfectly!!! VERY HAPPY wish i could buy more stuff that works this well!
customer_reviews.author: David Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Still great after a year!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a year now and it's wonderful! My 6 grandchildren are ages 2 to 5 and this table is solid, sturdy, cleans well and is comfortable for 4 kids, although for meals they managed with 3 on one side, doing crafts was better just 2 to a side. I chose this table because durability and safety was a primary concern with so many toddler/preschool aged little ones. It's not bright and colorful but I needed function and safety. Individual chairs can easily be moved around/tipped, and used for climbing. We use this every day and it's easy to fold and move to another room or out of site if needed.
customer_reviews.author: BK Adams

customer_reviews.title: Set up very nicely. Only gave 4 stars as my son hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up very nicely plus the table appeared to be very sturdy. Only gave 4 stars as my son hasn't used it yet as it was a birthday present for my granddaughter. My daughter-in-law (very tiny) will have to sit with her (for safety reasons ) as her feet do not yet touch the ground. The reason for this particular purchase was due to the fact that you can slide in from all sides vs. the child's picnic tables, as cute as they are, prevents a child from sliding in and out, therefore, I felt she would get a lot more use from this open seat style + children would have a bit more seat room..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: practical kids picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Nice well made sturdy kids picnic table perfect for eating meals or we sometimes use it to color or make crafts. The kids age 5 and 3 like sitting at it to eat or play . The perfect size for them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mendola

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We have the adult Lifetime picnic tables and chairs..and my kids needed a kids table. So I thought I would get this instead of a cheap colored plastic one that would break in 2years. And the size is awesome! It could comfortably fit 6 kids! And I really love if I need it out of the way it folds completely flat!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Banish the Kids (to Their Own Table)
customer_reviews.text: Get the kids off the adults' table! This has been a great addition to our dining area that has allowed our smaller kids to have a table just to themselves. Obviously, this works as well outdoors as it does indoors. It's sturdy and what you'd expect from a Lifetime polycarbonate table. I appreciate that, once folded, the metal tube frame includes a grab handle to carry and stow the table away.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pic nick table for kids. It's very sturdy, easy to assemble and cleans up well. We were very pleased. We ordered it for the grand kids. They painted on it, played games and ate on it outside by the pool. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Koogler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, and a perfect height for our 2yo. We use the table as an art area for our youngest son. He fingerpaints, colors, uses play-doe, etc on this table. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table!
customer_reviews.text: Best kid picnic table! I folds flat for easy storage, wipes clean for messy eaters, perfect height, and light to carry! The kids love to sit at it for supper, breakfast, and lunch. Playdoh is amazing to as its easy to clean up afterwards. Our two kids beg to sit at it for every meal and snack. It's become a permanent fixture in our home now!
customer_reviews.author: BSones

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I got it for my 3 and 4 year old and has yet to fail us. My daughter drew on it once with whiteboard marker and it was so easy to clean. It’s the table they eat on and work on. Very handy and so glad I invested
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for our balcony fir the kids. It is a little wiggely as others suggested but i m still keeping it. It will serve the purpose i need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it can support 300 pounds it can support 4 kids
customer_reviews.text: This table is tough ....does it shimmy ? Yes but that's kind of inherently necessary in a folding design I weight well over 300 pounds and have sat on top several times without worry
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Lifetime Product
customer_reviews.text: I've become a big fan of Lifetime products, and this one is just as good as the rest. Note the dimensions ... I got this for my 2-year old niece, and the size is perfect. But it would be small for an older kid. In that case, the kids chairs and an adjustable height table would be better. However, this table is very nice for the young ones because they can't slide the chairs around. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This  is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table, very sturdy, big enough for me to sit at with my "grands" but small enough for them to sit at comfortably as well. It arrived perfectly in tact and set up without tools. Powder coat looks very nice and appears very durable. The best part was that it folds down flat and can be stored easily. This is way better than a plastic table.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: old grand-daughter was absolutely delighted that she had her own table at our Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old grand-daughter was absolutely delighted that she had her own table at our Christmas dinner. What I love is that it is perfect for inside the house as well as outside in warmer weather. This way I won't have to buy something separate for summertime BBQ's. It is a 2 in 1. It is sturdy and very well made. When we were done, we just folded it up and put it in the garage. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Evans

product_meta.title: Lifetime 280094 Kid's Picnic Table
product_meta.description: Give your kids a place to call their own with a kids picnic table from Lifetime Products. Seating up to four kids comfortably, the kids picnic tables fold flat for easy storage and transportation. Constructed of high-density polyethylene (HDPE) and powder-coated steel, our picnic tables are stain resistant, easy to clean, and UV-protected.
feature_bullets: 32.5" kid's picnic table is constructed of High Density Polyethylene with impact resistant corners for superior strength and durability

Seats up to four children comfortably. Dimensions (Open)- 32.5 in. L x 35.5 in. W x 21.1 in. H (82,5 cm x 90,1 cm x 53,4 cm). Bench Dimensions - 32.4 in. L x 7 in. W x 12.7 in. H (82,5 cm L x 17,8 cm W x 32,5 cm H)
Uv-Protected table top and benches are stain resistant and easy to clean
Will not crack, chip or peel; Backed by a 2-year limited manufacturer warranty
Folds flat for easy transport and storage; Some assembly required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,786 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
